globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.youtube.com https://s.ytimg.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; media-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com; frame-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.supabase.co;
